# Demonstration of a few molecule statements
# This starts in pause mode; press space to unpause

# graphics opengl

disable_threading
dim 3
max_species 6
max_mol 300

species red
species green
species blue
species yellow
species magenta
species cyan

color red 1 0 0
color green 0 1 0
color blue 0 0 1
color yellow 1 1 0
color magenta 1 0 1
color cyan 0 1 1

difc all 3

time_start 0
time_stop 10000
time_step 0.01

boundaries 0 -50 50 r
boundaries 1 -50 50 r
boundaries 2 -50 50 r

mol 50 red 0 0 0
mol 50 green -50--40 -50-0 -50-50
mol 50 blue 30-40 50 u
mol 50 yellow u 10--10 u
mol 50 magenta 20-20 u 40
mol 50 cyan 40 40 -40

# cmd b pause

end_file
